title: Replace placeholder logos with actual Barebarbells logo image

requirements.summary: Replace all placeholder/text-based logos with uploaded Barebarbells logo image throughout the site
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded Barebarbells logo image appears in the Navigation component header
The uploaded Barebarbells logo image appears in the Hero section
The uploaded Barebarbells logo image appears in the Footer component
All previous placeholder or text-based logo implementations are removed
The logo maintains appropriate sizing and quality across all placements

file_operations.description: Replace the current SVG dumbbell icon and 'BAREBARBELLS' text logo with an img element that references the uploaded logo image at frontend/public/assets/IMG_20260220_224309-2.jpg. Maintain appropriate sizing for the navigation header (approximately h-8 to h-10) and ensure the logo is clickable to scroll to top.

Replace the current text-based logo display (stylized 'BAREBARBELLS' text with barbell SVG) with an img element that references the uploaded logo image at frontend/public/assets/IMG_20260220_224309-2.jpg. Size appropriately for the hero section (larger than navigation, approximately h-24 to h-32) and maintain the existing fade-in animation.

Replace the current SVG dumbbell icon and 'BAREBARBELLS' text in the footer with an img element that references the uploaded logo image at frontend/public/assets/IMG_20260220_224309-2.jpg. Size appropriately for the footer (approximately h-6 to h-8) and ensure it maintains proper spacing with surrounding footer content.
